title: Of that, she is sure
body:
She remembers the way he smells, fresh mint no matter the time of day or night, always mint. At first she had found it odd but now she has come to miss it- though she would never tell anyone so. 

She remembers the cadence of his voice, rumbling and low. His words sounding almost like melody, a song- matching his mockingbird pin. 

She remembers the colour of his blood, glowing pitch black in the moonlight and scarlet in the rays of the sun.

The body was left at her request. She sat at the table staring endlessly at the pool of blood spilling its way across the floor growing further and further away from its previous home. Someone had tried to clear it away but she asked them to stop, although pleaded was probably a better description of the tone of her voice. There were tears in her eyes but if anyone were to ask she would tell them it was tiredness, maybe they were dry from staring at his lifeless corpse. Either way, tears were streaming down her cheeks; hot and cold against her face.

After a while, Arya comes to retrieve her, she tries to pull away, wishing she could watch him forever, fearing that if she looked away all of this would be real and he would be gone to her forever. He’s already gone though, the life had spilled out of him when her sister sliced his throat open and bled him dry. 

She finds her self opening her eyes in a bed she no longer remembers getting into and immediately grasps her chamber pot and empties her twisting stomach, the bile burning her tongue and mouth. She finds this cycle repeating every morning for weeks.

She knows what this means but is confused in how she should feel. He betrayed her mother, he betrayed her. He’s the reason almost all her family is dead. It was all because of him. And now she carries his child in her womb. His flesh and blood grows within her and she can’t help but feel joy in keeping a piece of him with her, even after all he has done.

She remembers the night they spent together, he was surprisingly gentle, tending to her every wanton need. The pain was momentary before it was swept aside by pleasure she has never since been able to find or feel. He made love to her, of that she is sure. After all the lies, half truths and deceit he did love her to the point of obsession or at least a part of her. The part resembling her mother. He touched her like she was glass, he never marred her skin, left anything on her that would let anyone know that for a night she had been his. Or at least that’s what she had thought, now she carries his child. 

The months pass and her stomach grows, her siblings look at her with pity, as do the people and she wishes she cared enough to feel something about it. But she doesn’t care, he is still with her and has never left her side. 

Maybe she loved him, maybe she cared for him. She will love this child, of that she is sure. Her siblings will not understand but she doesn’t need them to. They didn’t know him, not really. They knew of his actions and his decisions, they did not know him- not like she does. 

When they child is born she names him Petyr, his eyes are the same mix of grey and green, his hair dark and curly. His smile is Sansa’s though and she thinks that is for the best, if she ever saw his smile again she thinks she would break.

The babe is small, like him. Clever and witty, like him. 

She watches him play and the smile on her face is sad, this must have been what he was like as a child. Young, carefree, happy- before the world crashed around him and he became the man she knew, the man she gave herself to, the man she had killed.

She will love and protect this child, she won’t let him grow into the man he was, this child will have fresh start and be loved. Of that, she is sure.

blog.name: lilbreck
blog.title: Jon would never. Lord Snow did.
blog.description:
⚠ Extreme Jonsa Content ⚠
🙅🏻 I Block Demons 🙅🏻

question: asoiaf(.)westeros(.)org/index(.)php?/topic/148752-season-8-news-spoilers-and-leaks/&page=56&tab=comments#comment-8250408 // Your opinions ?
answer:
It’s reaching to say the very least (especially since they cite boatsexbaby as a source of leaks).

We’ve seen statues of living people in the show, and it’s possible the statue is commissioned of her because she’s queen. Sansa dying doesn’t serve the story, neither the one the show is telling, nor the one GRRM is telling.

summary: the starks as brooklyn 99 quotes ned: oh i love being scary ned, he says what regular ned is thinking. (as scary ned) THIS IS...
body:
the starks as brooklyn 99 quotes

ned: oh i love being scary ned, he says what regular ned is thinking. (as scary ned) THIS IS TAKING TOO LONG, I’M GONNA MISS THE FARMER’S MARKET!

catelyn: my life stinks. ned is sick, my favorite mango yogurt got discontinued, and arya thinks her septa’s a stupidface

robb: i didn’t understand why people cared about their dumb dogs so much until i got a dumb dog myself. i’ve only had grey wind for a day and a half, but if anything happened to him, i would kill everyone in this room and then myself.

jon: the doctor said all my bleeding was internal. that’s where all the blood is supposed to be!

sansa: i was born for politics. I have great hair and i love lying

arya: be myself, what kind of garbage advice is that?

bran: the universe is a cruel and vexing puzzle. i am at the whim of the cosmos.

rickon: it’s real life die hard!! i mean, oh no, crime

summary: Contractual Obligations: “She’s a pretty thing, tall and slim and fragile like the glass roses Father had made for Mama when he...
caption:
Contractual Obligations: “She’s a pretty thing, tall and slim and fragile like the glass roses Father had made for Mama when he asked her to marry him, the glass roses she displays in the window of her solar so they catch the sun as it sets and paint the whole room in shades of gold and pink. Mama arranges for her to be dressed in blues and greys and white, both noon and dawn, and with that shock of hair, she makes for a very pretty picture indeed. Any man would be glad to have such a lovely girl as his wife, but Willas tries very hard to not just be any man, and he can’t help but be a little frustrated.” 

HAPPY BIRTHDAY, DEAR @cosmonauthill !!

blog.name: wolfqueen-is-here
blog.title: I'm not a Stark. | You are to me.
blog.description: Former: jonsacravings. She/her, bi. Posting: GoT, Jonsa, Sansa Stark, House Stark | Also loves: musical theatre, travelling, B99, Downton Abbey, Dragon Age II & more | Introverted but friendly.

tags: they're each heroes in their own way
title: I’m not sexist, but...
body:
Here we go again!


Sansa haters: Ugh, I’ve always hated Sansa, she’s the most useless character on the show!

Common sense: Whoa there! It’s because you’re sexist, isn’t it?

Sansa haters: Sexist?! How can I be sexist? I love Arya, and Dany, and Brienne…

Common sense: That’s awesome, may I ask why though?

Sansa haters: What do you mean why? ‘Cause they’re badass, they fight, they kill, they take care of themselves, they’re not just sitting there letting people abuse and hurt them. They’re not dreaming of princes and dresses, look at them go!

Common sense: *teasingly* It’s almost like their most admirable traits aren’t typically female…

Sansa haters: Exactly!

Common sense: Wow. Thank you. Totally not sexist. I was so wrong about you, I’m sorry. *silently to themselves* I’m surrounded by idiots.

blog.name: lullikiish

tags: they are both stand-ins for sansa
summary:
For those who have read the books (I might be slow, I know)...
Alys (Karstark) + Jeyne (Poole)
= Al(a)yne = Sansa
Sansa is the...
body:
For those who have read the books (I might be slow, I know)…

Alys (Karstark) + Jeyne (Poole)

= Al(a)yne = Sansa

Sansa is the girl Mel was talking about, they are just both foreshadowings for her. If she wasn’t important why would Mel have a vision of her.

Also, tag any drawings under #oberyn’s saucy art. Yes, I am in fact Oberyn Martell. For those on mobile, here is my ship list: https://incorrect-got-quotes.tumblr.com/list-of-ships Main: garnetislovegarnetislife. SUBMISSION BOX IS (MOST LIKELY) PERMANENTLY CLOSED!

blog.name: bethnoel
blog.title: Obsessive Personality
blog.description: Female, 22. Gif-maker. Member of Snowsource. Blog is mostly Sansa Stark, Jon Snow, House Stark, and Jonsa, along with whatever else that catches my eye. I don't usually post anything negative about characters or ships.

summary: Wouldn't. While Sansa is a princess, liked by her people, with the support of or have a blood bond with several influential,...
question: Wouldn't. While Sansa is a princess, liked by her people, with the support of or have a blood bond with several influential, powerful lords and the only thing that could be a 'problem' is being a woman, which became an invalid argument when the misogynistic lords wanted to depose their male ruler to crown her instead.
answer: Jon was selected because of the Battle of the Bastards for baffling reasons (he avenged the Red Wedding how?). I do think Sansa being a girl was the reason they overlooked her because Jon made many tactical mistakes in that battle. I mean Lyanna was like, “He has Stark blood in him.” Like bitch so does Sansa and she brought the army that won the battle. I think those lords realising Sansa should have been their monarch from the beginning was a better sign of how good Sansa was at ruling than any other scene.

reblog.comment: Jon was selected because of the Battle of the Bastards for baffling reasons (he avenged the Red Wedding how?). I think those lords realising Sansa should have been their monarch from the beginning was a better sign of how good Sansa was at ruling than any other scene.

Currently into the MCU but still an ASOIAF and stars wars fan. Patiently waiting for TWOW as Game of Thrones is dead to me. My ships are problematic and I don't care Judy, I truly don't.

summary: queen give me a fancast of sansa and little finger, if they weren’t played by Sophie and Aidan, who would you choose? you can...
question: queen give me a fancast of sansa and little finger, if they weren’t played by Sophie and Aidan, who would you choose? you can also name models, not just actors
answer:
ummmm, ok, so here are ladies who’s faces think could work as a sansa (this is regardless of current age, eye colour, english accent ability and height)

Emily Browning

Holliday Grainger

Lily Rose Depp

and for Petyr,

Tom Hughes

The long since left us Ronald Colman

and by now your saying, wow connie, those 3 ladies look awfully similar and so do those two men, and yes! yes they do! because I have very specific images ingrained in my head for what petyr and sansa look like in my head and I do my best to find these people who fit them

but even after all these alternative I still think sophie turner is still the most sansa to me i miss her red hair so much

summary: Looking for a fic, any help?
title: Looking for a fic, any help?
body: I’ve gotten really into reading Game of Thrones recently and I read a fic where Sansa was in Dorne, she was possibly married to Oberyn or betrothed, I’m not sure.  But Oberyn asked her about some of the superstitions of the North and is delighted by how different they are to Dornish superstitions.  Sansa possibly declared that Thorren Stark was her favourite royal figure from the North, simply because he bent the knee to Aegon Targaryen I to save the people of the North from the dragons.  Can anyone help me find this?  It was most likely on Ao3?
